metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4680 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
FreeRADIUS 2.2.x before 2.2.8 and 3.0.x before 3.0.9 does not properlycheck revocation of intermediate CA certificates.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4680` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freeradius - 2.2.8+dfsg-0.1build2
freeradius-common - 2.2.8+dfsg-0.1build2
freeradius-iodbc - 2.2.8+dfsg-0.1build2
freeradius-krb5 - 2.2.8+dfsg-0.1build2
freeradius-ldap - 2.2.8+dfsg-0.1build2
freeradius-mysql - 2.2.8+dfsg-0.1build2
freeradius-postgresql - 2.2.8+dfsg-0.1build2
freeradius-utils - 2.2.8+dfsg-0.1build2
libfreeradius2 - 2.2.8+dfsg-0.1build2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freeradius package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.8+dfsg-0.1build2').
